mapper.select: SELECT sno, sname, sage, ssex, sgrade, scredit, class.clno, class.scno, scname FROM student JOIN class ON class.Clno = student.Clno JOIN school ON class.Scno = school.Scno WHERE sname like concat('%', #{sname}, '%') and sno like concat('%', #{sno}, '%') ORDER BY sno

SELECT sno, sname, sage, ssex, sgrade, scredit, class.clno, class.scno, scname FROM student JOIN class ON class.Clno = student.Clno JOIN school ON class.Scno = school.Scno WHERE sno IN (SELECT sno FROM sel WHERE cno = ${cno}) ORDER BY sno
